topics_and_summary.datasets.twenty_news_groups module¶

class topics_and_summary.datasets.twenty_news_groups.TwentyNewsGroupsDataset(remove_header=True, remove_footer=True, remove_quotes=True, dataset_path=None)[source]¶

Bases: topics_and_summary.datasets.structured_dataset.StructuredDataset

Class that represents the 20_newsgroups dataset. This class can apply a first specific preprocessing on the dataset files.

get_original_doc_content_from_disk(doc: topics_and_summary.datasets.common.Document) → str[source]¶

Given a Document object, this method return it’s content obtained from disk as a str.

Parameters

doc – Document.

Returns

Content of the given document obtained from disk.

print_some_files(n=3, print_file_num=True)[source]¶

Prints some text files from the corpus. This function can be used to see how the preprocessing affects the dataset documents.

classmethod load(name: str, folder_path: str = None) → topics_and_summary.datasets.twenty_news_groups.TwentyNewsGroupsDataset[source]¶

Loads a saved dataset from disk. This function must be used to load datasets, instead of utils.the load_obj_from_disk() function, because this function updates the current value of the dataset path.

Parameters

  • name – Name of the dataset.

  • folder_path – Path of the folder where the dataset is stored on disk.

Returns

The object loaded from disk.

class topics_and_summary.datasets.twenty_news_groups.TwentyNewsGroupsDocument(directory_name: str, name: str, content: str = None)[source]¶

Bases: topics_and_summary.datasets.structured_dataset.StructuredDocument

Class that represents a 20_newsgroups document.
